title: my favorite part about kled
body:
is when youre dismounted and eerie music starts playing

and then kled starts saying extremely paranoid things

and then he also starts rambling about that 'dang lizard'

god its an experience it really is playing this champion. Well done.

replies.body:
Aww now I feel all warm and fuzzy,  I'll pass it on as hugs for Kyle and the rest of the team.


....now where in h311 did I put my mushroom JUICE!
HEY YOU, DID YOU STEAL TACOS FROM ME?
Shhh, them brain badgers probably listenin for us!

HOLY S*** WHERE ARE THEY!?

We need more champions that swear like that, screw being a rated T game that's funny as hell

I have a question regarding this. Kled has some amazing lines for when he was knocked off of his lizard, but when his enemy knocks him off they don't hear any of them.

They DO however hear the slight sound/music cue. What kind of decisions were made regarding making this the case? How would it be if the enemy heard his dialogue instead? I understand that having too much sound can crowd out the gameplay, but the sound that currently plays for the enemy is unlike anything else in the game.

> [{quoted}](name=Nova Force,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=i1UIr1Wp,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2016-11-30T03:02:36.499+0000)
>
> I have a question regarding this. Kled has some amazing lines for when he was knocked off of his lizard, but when his enemy knocks him off they don't hear any of them.
> 
> They DO however hear the slight sound/music cue. What kind of decisions were made regarding making this the case? How would it be if the enemy heard his dialogue instead? I understand that having too much sound can crowd out the gameplay, but the sound that currently plays for the enemy is unlike anything else in the game.

Yeah I think that would add a TON of clarity for whoever is playing against Kled. Sometimes you I don't hear it (or maybe I missed it?) If he gets knocked off in a bush I'm not in.
It was probably those invisible badgers again! Always taking the mushroom juice for themselves!

Aw, I am so high right now. I don't even know where I am.

{{champion:17}}

Wait he does. 0_0

Woah, talk about character depth.

And here I am just taking my time whenever I ult as Jhin, taking advantage of the moment and breathing in the atmosphere generated by the chorus. Honestly thought that was unique to him.
Yorick also has an ambience when he's near the Maiden. It's like he's getting corrupted just by standing near it (because he probably is).
His best line is where he says he can still hear the lizard. Shut up, damn lizard.

{{champion:240}}: "[mumbles]...W-what was that? Run straight into the tower?" 

I love Kled, he has an insanely dynamic VO and it's just a joy to listen to. You can really tell they put a lot of effort into him.

Pretty much everything this guy says is brilliant.

{{champion:240}}: Yes, a sane man WOULD run, BUT I AIN'T THE RUNNIN' KIND!
I'LL SAY SOMETHING WITTY AFTER I KILL YOU!
Shhh... it's time to get violent....... and weird.
I never noticed the music, because I'm usually ham sandwich deep in combat and either me or the other guy is dying.
Or the fact that he trash talks your opponents for you when you kill them.
